Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2010 07:10PM Diva wrote: I started losing my hair exactly 14 days after my 1st chemo treatment August 2009 and my hair started growing back immediately 2 wees after my last chemo treatment October 2009.  Today I still have it short, because I fell in love with it.  There are days that I miss my long hair, but I love the new short hairdo.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
